#!/bin/bash
rumCmd=/usr/local/bin/RemoteUpdateManager
if [ ! -x "$rumCmd" ] then echo 'ERROR: $rumCmd is not installed' exit 1 fi
if ! "$rumCmd" --action=list 2>&1 | grep -q "AdobeLightroom-6.0/6.6.1" then echo 'NOTICE: AdobeLightroom-6.0/6.6.1 is not available' exit 0 fi
echo "Asking RUM to install update 'AdobeLightroom-6.0/6.6.1'"
"$rumCmd" --channelIds="AdobeLightroom-6.0" --action=install 2>&1 if [ $? -ne 0 ] then echo 'ERROR: there was a Adobe RUM problem with AdobeLightroom-6.0/6.6.1' exit 1 else echo 'OK: AdobeLightroom-6.0/6.6.1 was installed' fi
# RemoteUpdateManager_Downloads is a RUM leftover that is owned by root:admin # Fix or remove RemoteUpdateManager_Downloads as this directory causes permission issues itemsToFix=$(find /Users/*/Library/Application\ Support/Adobe/RemoteUpdateManager_Downloads 2>/dev/null)
IFS=$'\n'
if [ ! "" == "$itemsToFix" ] then for dirToFix in $itemsToFix do chmod a+rwx "$dirToFix" && logTyper "Fixed '$dirToFix'" #rm -rf "$dirToFix" && logTyper "Removed '$dirToFix'" done fi
# fix visible version number for Abobe Lightroom
LightroomAppInfoFile="/Applications/Adobe Lightroom/Adobe Lightroom.app/Contents/Info.plist"
if [ -e "$LightroomAppInfoFile" ] then getSrc=$(defaults read "$LightroomAppInfoFile" CFBundleVersion 2>/dev/null)
if [ ! "" == "$getSrc" ] then defaults write "$LightroomAppInfoFile" CFBundleShortVersionString "$getSrc" 2>/dev/null plutil -convert xml1 "$LightroomAppInfoFile" 2>/dev/null chmod a+r "$LightroomAppInfoFile" 2>/dev/null fi fi
exit 0
